member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK
member.summary: Contains extended working set information for a page.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Flags
member.summary: The working set information. See the description of the structure members for information about the layout of this variable.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Valid
member.summary: If this bit is 1, the subsequent members are valid; otherwise they should be ignored.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.ShareCount
member.summary: The number of processes that share this page. The maximum value of this member is 7.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Win32Protection
member.summary: The memory protection attributes of the page. For a list of values, seeMemory Protection Constants.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Shared
member.summary: If this bit is 1, the page can be shared.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Node
member.summary: The NUMA node. The maximum value of this member is 63.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Locked
member.summary: If this bit is 1, the virtual page is locked in physical memory.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.LargePage
member.summary: If this bit is 1, the page is a large page.

summary.para: Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This member is not available before Windows Server 2012 and Windows 8.
If this bit is 1, the page is has been reported as bad.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This member is not available before Windows Server 2012 and Windows 8.
Reserved. This member is only available on 64-bit code running on 64-bit editions of Windows.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This member is not available before Windows Server 2012 and Windows 8.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Invalid
member.summary: Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This structure is not available before Windows Server 2012 and Windows 8.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Invalid.Valid
member.summary: If this bit is 0, the subsequent members are valid; otherwise they should be ignored.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Invalid.Shared
member.summary: If this bit is 1, the page can be shared.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Invalid.Bad
member.summary: If this bit is 1, the page is has been reported as bad.

member.name: PSAPI_WORKING_SET_EX_BLOCK.Invalid.ReservedUlong
member.summary: Reserved. This member is only available on 64-bit code running on 64-bit editions of Windows.
